item.title: EXC
item.description: score:88 Chances: ComEd received the 2024 Best Practices Awards for launching Powering Lives Resource Fairs, connecting low-income customers to support options Exelon reported a rise in revenue and net income for the full year 2023, showing positive financial performance The company is making investments in infrastructure and operational excellence, leading to adjusted operating earnings increase Risks: Purging fossil fuels from the US grid is expensive and could lead to pushback over rising customer utility bills, potentially slowing the transition toward renewable power Exelon’s increased transmission spending may lead to higher operating expenses and potential impact on overall profitability Score:88 chances characters count - risks characters count = 88
